title: Keeper of Pleas
description: On December 10, 1880, Coroner Sévère makes a gruesome nine newborns, buried in flowerpots, and hidden in plain sight in Whitechapel. A mortician receives the bodies and vanishes. Clues for the two seemingly unconnected cases are scarce.When police and coroner learn that the missing mortician might have spent his last moments at the bosom of the infamous prostitute Miss Mary, a series of events is nudged into motion. Lies are unearthed, rumours spread. Yet, the killer remains a faceless phantom.His secret seems buried forever.Until the night Sévère requests Miss Mary’s services… Post-mortems and prostitution are shown unprettified.
author: Annelie Wendeberg
